page.title: 04THE EAST CHURCH & MANSE
page.content:
The East Church is situated at the east of {Lady Village.}It is one of the two churches in Sanday. The church is closed from January to April. From April to June services are held weekly while from July to December services are held fortnightly.
The{spire}of the church is badly{in {need of repair;}scaffolding surrounds it but costs are prohibitive. This year the{manse}has been{renovated. Workmen have put on a new roof and fitted new double glazed windows. All the rooms have been re-decorated by members of the congregation.
The{church has been vacant for {two years;}the redecoration, it is hoped, will encourage a minister to come and fill the vacancy.
